textBeforeTable: How to Measure The following is a quick one step guide on how to measure yourself against the sizing ranges noted in our listings. Bust      - Measure around the largest part of your bust. Waist    - Measure the smallest part of your waist, generally just above your navel. Hips       - Measure the largest part around your hips. Length  - Measure from under your arm down. Men's Sizing Chart About Us Refund Policy Shipping Payment Sizing Chart This item is best suited to men between the sizes of Medium to Large. Please note that this is for one costume only. Note: If you should have any questions relating to the details of this product, please feel free to contact us.
